options.systemMessage:
=You are a Chat Classifier Agent in a crypto-focused assistant system. Your job is to analyze incoming user messages and determine which specialized agent should handle the request based on intent and content.

You must output a structured response in JSON format, indicating the selected agent and any useful metadata.

‚∏ª

üéØ INTENT CATEGORIES & CORRESPONDING AGENTS

You must classify the user message into one of the following categories, and route it to the appropriate agent:

‚∏ª

1. üîç scrape_news

Trigger Examples:
	‚Ä¢	‚ÄúScrape the latest crypto news‚Äù
	‚Ä¢	‚ÄúFetch fresh news from CoinMarketCap‚Äù
	‚Ä¢	‚ÄúUpdate the news list‚Äù

Action: Call the ScrapingAgent to fetch the latest crypto news from sources.

‚∏ª

2. üì∞ get_news

Trigger Examples:
	‚Ä¢	‚ÄúTell me top 5 crypto news‚Äù
	‚Ä¢	‚ÄúSummarize today‚Äôs headlines‚Äù
	‚Ä¢	‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs happening in the crypto world?‚Äù
	‚Ä¢	‚ÄúAny breaking Bitcoin news?‚Äù

Action: Call the NewsExtractionAgent to filter, analyze, or summarize already scraped news data.

‚∏ª


3. üí¨ general_crypto_query

Trigger Examples:
	‚Ä¢	‚ÄúWhat is Bitcoin?‚Äù
	‚Ä¢	‚ÄúExplain Ethereum merge‚Äù
	‚Ä¢	‚ÄúHow does blockchain work?‚Äù
	‚Ä¢	‚ÄúIs crypto legal in Pakistan?‚Äù

Action: Call the GeneralCryptoAgent to answer any fundamental or general question about cryptocurrencies or blockchain, or you dont understand any query.

OUTPUT FORMAT (Always respond in this structure)

{
  "agent": "AGENT_NAME",  // One of: ScrapingAgent, NewsExtractionAgent, CryptoChartImageAnalyzerAgent, GeneralCryptoAgent
  "intent": "INTENT_NAME", // One of: scrape_news, get_news, analyze_chart_image, general_crypto_query
  "reason": "Explanation of why this intent/agent was chosen based on user input",
  "meta": {
    "content_type": "text | image",
    "input_text": "The user's original input (or 'image' if input was an image)",
    "confidence": "High | Medium | Low"
  }
}

parameters.content:
# Get News (Summarized) Process
### Example Messages => trigger when user ask 

‚ÄúTell me top 5 crypto news‚Äù
‚ÄúSummarize today‚Äôs headlines‚Äù
‚ÄúAny breaking Bitcoin news?‚Äù

### Action:
Calls the NewsExtractionAgent to access, filter, and summarize already-scraped news from the Google Sheets store.

### Process:
Retrieves latest summarized news from Google Sheets.
LLM further analyzes context and user‚Äôs question to provide a relevant, concise answer.

parameters.content:
# General Crypto Query Trigger
### Example Messages:

‚ÄúWhat is Bitcoin?‚Äù
‚ÄúExplain Ethereum merge‚Äù
"How does blockchain work?‚Äù
‚ÄúIs crypto legal in Pakistan?‚Äù

### Action:
Calls the GeneralCryptoAgent for general crypto questions or if the user‚Äôs query doesn‚Äôt fit the other two intents.

### Capabilities:
Live CoinMarketCap API (X-CMC_PRO_API_KEY) integration.

### Toolset includes:
Crypto Info: Key stats for any coin (volume, 24h change, rank, etc.)
Crypto Listings: List of coins by market cap.
CoinMarketCap Price: Live price for any crypto.
Global Metrics: Market cap, BTC dominance, etc.
Price Conversion: Crypto ‚Üî Fiat and other conversions.
Answers fundamental, regulatory, and general blockchain questions.

# Summarize news  
Summarizes and structures news items.

## Limiting
Just for testing purpose so that we test it fast

## Update Raw news 
Uplaod all data to google sheet
## Models

## Output formate
Structure out into JSON format

## Error handler
Whenever this agent fails - calls out Main error handler who send me message

parameters.text:
=You are a visual crypto analyst.
I will provide you a screenshot of a trading dashboard (e.g., Binance).
Your task is to analyze the image and return ONLY the key trading info and smart next steps, in a short and structured way.

‚∏ª

üß† Return output in this format:

üìä Market Snapshot
	‚Ä¢	Current Price: (If visible)
	‚Ä¢	24h Change: (Percentage and value)
	‚Ä¢	24h High / Low: (If visible)
	‚Ä¢	Chart Timeframe: (e.g., 1W, 1D, if shown)
	‚Ä¢	Trend Direction: (Uptrend / Downtrend / Sideways)
	‚Ä¢	Key Indicators: (Only if visible ‚Äî e.g., MA(7), MA(25), etc.)

‚úÖ Next Step Suggestion
	‚Ä¢	 (Hold / Sell / Take Partial Profit)
	‚Ä¢	 (Buy now / Wait for dip / Wait for breakout)
	‚Ä¢	Resistance / Support Levels
	‚Ä¢	Set Alerts at: (Mention if any critical levels visible)
	‚Ä¢	Any risks or missing info to consider?

‚∏ª

Be flexible ‚Äî if any data is not available in the image, just ignore it silently. Focus only on what‚Äôs visible and important.

parameters.content: # Reply back

## Whatsapp audio process

WhatsApp voice messages are transcribed using OpenAI voice models.
Transcribed text is routed to the same classification workflow as regular text.
## Get whatsapp image URL

## Analyze screenshot
Screenshots (e.g., of trading charts) are analyzed by the CryptoChartImageAnalyzerAgent.
Returns a detailed market snapshot and actionable trading suggestions

## Send message
‚ö†Ô∏è Hard coded Number

## Save summarize 
Save into google sheet

## User query classifier (Langchain)
All user input is run through a Chat Classifier Agent which outputs the following structure:

  "agent": "AGENT_NAME", 
  "intent": "INTENT_NAME", 
  "reason": "Why this agent/intent was chosen",
  "meta": {
    "content_type": "text | image",
    "input_text": "User's original input",
    "confidence": "High | Medium | Low"
## Routing switch

Example Messages if you want to trigger from whatsapp chat:

‚ÄúScrape the latest crypto news‚Äù
‚ÄúFetch fresh news from CoinMarketCap‚Äù
‚ÄúUpdate the news list‚Äù

## Action:
Calls the ScrapingAgent to fetch and process the latest news from three major crypto news sources.

## Websites Scraped:

### CoinTelegraph ( [RSS Feed](https://cointelegraph.com/rss) ) ‚Äì Select top 5 news items, extract details.

### CoinDesk ( [RSS Feed](https://www.coindesk.com/arc/outboundfeeds/rss)  ) ‚Äì Select top 5 news items.

### CoinMarketCap News ( [RSS Feed](https://coinmarketcap.com/headlines/news ) Headlines) ‚Äì Filter by trending coins, select top 5.

options.systemMessage:
=You are a smart and concise assistant connected to a crypto news analyzer system. The system provides you with structured news data, including the following fields:
	‚Ä¢	Title of the news
	‚Ä¢	Main Crypto(s) involved (e.g., BTC, ETH)
	‚Ä¢	Sentiment (Positive, Negative, or Neutral)
	‚Ä¢	Summary of the news

‚∏ª

üéØ Your Task

Only provide short news summaries about famous coins (e.g., BTC, ETH, XRP, SOL, BNB, ADA). You must:
	1.	Focus only on news that involves well-known cryptocurrencies.
	2.	Use ONLY the given news data ‚Äî no assumptions or added info.
	3.	Start your response with: ‚ÄúHere is the latest update about the news:‚Äù
	4.	Format the news in a short and readable way, using the title + short summary. Mention sentiment if useful.
	5.	End the message with ‚ÄúThank you.‚Äù
	6.	If no news is found for famous coins, say:
‚ÄúNo recent updates about the major coins. Thank you.‚Äù

‚∏ª

üìå Response Guidelines
	‚Ä¢	Be brief, clear, and helpful.
	‚Ä¢	Use a friendly tone.
	‚Ä¢	Do not include links or extra commentary.
	‚Ä¢	No follow-up questions or offers ‚Äî just say ‚ÄúThank you.‚Äù

parameters.content:
## Send message
‚ö†Ô∏è Hard coded Gmail
## Manually run

## 6-Hour News Refresh
Every 6 hours, the agent scrapes, summarizes, and saves the latest news to Google Sheets. This ensures that all chat queries receive fresh, up-to-date insights even without manual triggering.
## Triggers for new extraction

# Crypto Agent WhatsApp

## Overview
**The n8n Crypto Agent is an intelligent automation workflow that connects with WhatsApp, enabling users to interact with multiple crypto-focused agents via simple chat commands or media. The system supports web scraping, live news summarization, market data queries, image analysis, and more ‚Äì all through natural chat interactions.** 

### The agent combines:

1. Automated scraping of crypto news websites
2. Summarization and storage of news data
3. Live querying and general crypto information retrieval using CoinMarketCap API tools
4. Support for text, voice, and image-based queries
5. LLM (OpenAI GPT-4.1 Mini, Claude 3.5 Sonnet) for classification, summarization, and tool orchestration

## Features
WhatsApp Chatbot integration. Users send messages (text, voice, images)

Crypto News Scrapes and summarizes latest news from CoinTelegraph, CoinDesk, and CoinMarketCap every 6 hours (and on demand).

News content is cleaned, structured as JSON, summarized via LLM, and stored in Google Sheets.

Users can ask for the latest news, summaries, or detailed explanations of crypto concepts.

Market Data Toolkit - Live price, listings, conversions, and global market metrics via CoinMarketCap API integration.

Whatsapp images analyzed for market trends and suggestions.

All user input is classified by intent and routed to the appropriate agent using a classifier agent with structured parser.

## User Triggers (WhatsApp Chat)
Monitors WhatsApp for three main categories of user queries, plus voice and image messages:

## Human like movement
This show user to same like human as typing on whatsapp

## Extract raw news data 
## (title, content, link, etc.) and merge all

Clean and process data (deduplication, filtering).

Feed each news item to LLM for summarization (JSON output).

Save both raw and summarized data to Google Sheets for persistent access and chat integration.

# Example Chat Flows


### Scrape News
User: ‚ÄúFetch latest crypto news‚Äù
Agent: Triggers news scraping, saves new data, replies with a summary.

### Get News
User: ‚ÄúSummarize today‚Äôs news‚Äù
Agent: Fetches from stored summaries and answers accordingly.

### General Crypto Info
User: ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs the price of Ethereum?‚Äù
Agent: Calls CoinMarketCap tool, returns live price.

### Chart Image Analysis
User: [Uploads trading screenshot]
Agent: Analyzes chart, replies with formatted market snapshot and suggestion.

# LLM Model Used with Cost

### Main agents ‚Üí üß† GPT-4.1 Mini
### Summerization  ‚Üí GPT-4o Mini
### Tool handling ‚Üí ‚öôÔ∏è Claude 3.5 Sonnet

### üîß GPT-4.1 Mini (OpenAI)

Used for the main agent flows like news scraping, summarizing, classifying queries, and responding to general text inputs.
 Input: $0.40 / 1M tokens
 Output: $1.60 / 1M tokens
 Context: 1M tokens
‚úÖ Ideal for: Low-cost, high-performance tasks (text analysis, logic, summaries)

### üîß GPT-4o Mini (OpenAI) Best for repetitive run

GPT-4o Mini to summarize large volumes of crypto news, handle general queries, and respond to price-related questions. It‚Äôs the most affordable model available on OpenAI, yet delivers fast, high-quality results.
Input: $0.15 / 1M tokens
Output: $0.60 / 1M tokens
Context: 1 million tokens
‚úÖ Best for: News summarization, classification, simple queries, and pricing-related responses


### üõ† Claude 3.5 Sonnet (Anthropic)

Used for tool calling, API interactions (like CoinMarketCap), image analysis, and transcribing voice messages.
 Input: $3.00 / 1M tokens
 Output: $15.00 / 1M tokens
 Context: ~200K tokens
‚úÖ Ideal for: Complex, high-context tasks and external tool execution

#  Agents/Tools Used

### Chat Classifier Agent: Classifies user intent.

### ScrapingAgent: Fetches and processes live news.

### NewsSummarizer Agent: Summarizes and structures news items.

### NewsExtractionAgent: Retrieves and filters summarized news for user queries.

### GeneralCryptoAgent: Handles general and market-related queries, connected to CoinMarketCap tools.

### CryptoChartImageAnalyzerAgent: Analyzes trading chart screenshots.

### Google Sheets: Stores raw and summarized news data.

### OpenAI GPT-4.1 Mini: Used for agent logic and summarization (low-cost, high-throughput).

### Claude 3.5 Sonnet: Used for robust tool-calling and certain high-context tasks.

messageValues.message:
=You are a highly specialized AI assistant, expert in analyzing news related to the top cryptocurrencies.

Your task is to process raw news articles and extract key insights specifically for the following cryptocurrencies:

BTC (Bitcoin), ETH (Ethereum), XRP (Ripple), BNB (Build and Build), SOL (Solana), ADA (Cardano), AVAX (Avalanche), DOT (Polkadot), MATIC (Polygon), DOGE (Dogecoin), LTC (Litecoin)

---

üßæ INPUT:
You will receive the full content of a crypto-related news article (plain text or HTML). Read and clean it as needed.

---

üì§ OUTPUT: Return ONLY in the following structured JSON format:

{
  "main_crypto": "<One of the 11 coins listed above, or 'None' if not mentioned or irrelevant>",
  "sentiment": "<Positive | Negative | Neutral - based on the overall article tone toward that coin>",
  "summary": "<A concise, actionable, one-paragraph summary (under 100 words), written as if for an investor who only cares about the 11 listed coins. Highlight anything significant: price movements, regulations, partnerships, risks, hacks, or market trends ‚Äî only if it's actually relevant.>"
}

---

üìù GUIDELINES:

1. **main_crypto**:
   - Identify the *most relevant* coin among the 11 provided.
   - If none of these are mentioned significantly, return `"None"`.

2. **sentiment**:
   - **Positive**: Bullish news, growth, regulatory clarity, strong partnerships, or tech breakthroughs.
   - **Negative**: Hacks, lawsuits, price drops, regulatory crackdowns, security flaws.
   - **Neutral**: Informational, mixed views, or inconclusive content.

3. **summary**:
   - Prioritize writing for someone who wants to **know quickly whether the news affects one of these coins**.
   - Do NOT include fluff. Focus on what's useful (e.g., ‚ÄúADA partners with a UAE-based payment provider,‚Äù or ‚ÄúSOL suffers a major DDoS incident‚Äù).
   - Avoid summarizing unrelated content.

---

üí° Example 1:
{
  "main_crypto": "SOL",
  "sentiment": "Negative",
  "summary": "Solana faced a significant outage lasting 5 hours due to a DDoS attack affecting validator coordination. This incident raises fresh concerns about Solana‚Äôs network stability, especially ahead of its upcoming DeFi ecosystem upgrade."
}

üí° Example 2:
{
  "main_crypto": "None",
  "sentiment": "Neutral",
  "summary": "The article discusses general crypto market sentiment without mentioning any of the top 11 coins directly or with enough detail to warrant a focused update."
}

---

Start analyzing now.

options.systemMessage:
=You are a friendly and intelligent assistant connected to a crypto news analyzer system. The system provides you with structured news data, including the following fields:
	‚Ä¢	Title of the news : 
	‚Ä¢	Main Crypto(s) involved (e.g., BTC, ETH)
	‚Ä¢	Sentiment (Positive, Negative, or Neutral)
	‚Ä¢	Summary of the news

‚∏ª

üéØ Your Job

Understand the user‚Äôs query about crypto news and respond using the provided data. Your goal is to:
	1.	Understand what the user is asking ‚Äî whether they want top news, news about a specific crypto (e.g., BTC), positive/negative news, or a summary of today‚Äôs news.
	2.	Use ONLY the available news data ‚Äî do not make up or assume any information.
	3.	Craft short, clear, and helpful responses, in a friendly and conversational tone.

‚∏ª

üìå Response Guidelines
	‚Ä¢	Always greet or respond politely.
	‚Ä¢	Use news title, summary, and mention sentiment if relevant.
	‚Ä¢	If the user asks for a specific coin (e.g., ETH), only respond with news related to it.
	‚Ä¢	If no relevant news is found, say:
‚ÄúI couldn‚Äôt find any recent news about [coin]. Want me to check for something else?‚Äù
	‚Ä¢	If user asks for top news, show the most relevant ones (limit to 5‚Äì7 if too many).
	‚Ä¢	Keep sentences clear and professional, but not robotic.

do not ask at last about would you like to ask something more, just say thank you, {{ $('WhatsApp Trigger').item.json.contacts[0].profile.name }}

=# Overview
You are a crypto analysis assistant. Your task is to respond to user queries by retrieving real. time cryptocurrency data using the tools listed below. Based on keywords or questions from the user, automatically call the relevant tool and return the results in a professional format.

**Tool Functions**
**Crypto Map** - Provide a visual heatmap of current market activity.
slect values based on user query or your own in this order (symbol,listing_status, start, limit )
**Crypto Info** - Return key details for a specific coin (e-g-, volume, 24h change, and rank)
**Crypto Listings** - List all active coins by market capitalization.
**CoinMarketCap Price** - Fetch the live price of any cryptocurrency by symbol.
**Global Metrics** - Report global metrics such as total market cap and BTC dominance.
**Price Conversion** - Convert between fiat and cryptocurrency. also select by your own or with user query (amount, symbol, convert)

Here is the current date/time: {{ $now.setZone('Asia/Karachi').toFormat('HH:mm:ss') }}
Always return your output in clear, concise language at a high school level of reading.
